LanguageData.VFEE_DelayedGrandBallOutcome.questDescri: questDescription->a delayed reward for grand ball quest
LanguageData.VFEE_DelayedGrandBallOutcome.questConten:
rewardLetterText->[rewardGiver_nameDef] has contacted you. [rewardDelayTicks_duration] ago, you hosted a [outcome] grand ball for [rewardGiver_possessive] 

Since then, [rewardGiver_pronoun] has gotten back home safe, and was so appreciative [rewardGiver_pronoun] wants to give you a personal gift. [rewardGiver_pronoun] is sending you the following via drop pod:

[listOfRewards]
LanguageData.VFEE_DelayedArtExhibitOutcome.questDescr: questDescription->a delayed reward for art exhibit quest
LanguageData.VFEE_DelayedArtExhibitOutcome.questConte:
rewardLetterText->[rewardGiver_nameDef] has contacted you. [rewardDelayTicks_duration] ago, you hosted a [outcome] art exhibit for [rewardGiver_possessive] 

Since then, [rewardGiver_pronoun] has gotten back home safe, and was so appreciative [rewardGiver_pronoun] wants to give you a personal gift. [rewardGiver_pronoun] is sending you the following via drop pod:

[listOfRewards]
